Structure.Name: EHF Get Evidence Request
Structure.Description: Document type used to request evidences.

Element.Name: UBL Version Identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

Element.Name: Customization Identifier
Element.Description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

Element.Name: Profile Identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the business process context in which the transaction appears. It enables the buyer to process the invoice in an appropriate way.

Element.Name: Document identifier
Element.Description: An identification of the specification containing the total set of rules regarding semantic content, cardinalities and business rules to which the data contained in the instance document conforms. The identification may include the version of the specification as well as any customizations applied. Use UUID (universally unique identifier), version 4

Element.Name: Copy indicator
Element.Description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false)

Element.Name: Contract Folder Identifier
Element.Description: An identifier that is specified by the buyer and used as a reference number for all documents in the procurement process. It is also known as procurement project identifier, procurement reference number or contract folder identifier. A reference to the procurement procedure to which a Qualification request document and the delivered response documents are associated.

Element.Name: Issue date
Element.Description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued. Must not include timezone information. Format YYYY-MM-DD

Element.Name: Issue time
Element.Description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

Element.Name: Note
Element.Description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

Element.Name: Tendering Criterion
Element.Description: A criterion supporting Tenderer qualifications.

Element.Name: Identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for this item of criterion support.

Element.Name: Tendering Criterion Property Group
Element.Description: The sets of properties that can be used to fulfil the tendering criterion.

Element.Name: Identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for the group of criteria.

Element.Name: Tendering Criterion Property
Element.Description: All the criteria properties comprising the tendering criterion.

Element.Name: Identifier
Element.Description: An identifier to refer to the criterion property.

Element.Name: Evidence
Element.Description: An evidence that can be used to meet this criterion property.

Element.Name: Identifier
Element.Description: An identifier to refer to the evidence.

Element.Name: Evidence name
Element.Description: The name of the evidence.

Element.Name: Evidence Issuing Party
Element.Description: The party issuing the evidence.

Element.Name: Evidence URI
Element.Description: he Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies this party's web site; i.e., the web site's Uniform Resource Locator (URL)
